tool_description: Establishes and validates database connections for statistics collection operations across different database systems.

database_type.description: Database system type (postgresql, mysql, oracle, sqlserver, db2)

connection_string.description: Database connection string with host, port, database name

username.description: Database username with statistics access privileges

error_messages: Invalid database type: Use one of [postgresql, mysql, oracle, sqlserver, db2].
Connection failed: Check connection string format and network connectivity.
Authentication failed: Verify username and ensure proper privileges for statistics operations.
Timeout error: Connection timeout must be between 5-300 seconds.
usage: Provide database_type, connection_string, and username to establish connection. Optionally set connection_timeout for slower networks.

connection_id.description: Unique identifier for the established connection

database_version.description: Version information of the connected database
